Description: Thinning out my personal collection of guitars. Only played at home. This chameleon color is definitely very cool looking, especially in bright lighting and sounds incredible. Simplicity, efficiency and affordability are paramount principles on which RGT series is built. It`s models come with regular RG bodies and simplified specs lists, which include only the bare necessities. RGT6EXFX is a solid, double-cut guitar with a body made of basswood. Top side is flat and has no pickguard. Also, there`s no binding around the top. The Blue Chameleon is finished in gloss.. Hardtail bridge is equipped with string-through construction and paired with Ibanez tuners. EMG 81 and 85 pickups have a basic controls unit. Five-piece maple neck has a Wizard II contour in the back and a 24-fret rosewood fingerboard on the top. Features: Wizard II (neck-thru) 5-piece. Maple/Walnut neck material Basswood body 24/Jumbo frets Bound Rosewood fingerboard Fixed bridge EMG 85 (H) neck pickup EMG 81 (H) bridge pickup Off-set dot inlay Basswood Body Basswood is a comparatively lightweight wood, which makes it very comfortable for extended playing. With a good balance of highs and lows, Basswood is right in between Alder and Mahogany in sound character. 24/Jumbo Frets Jumbo frets offer easy playing for leads and chording. Fixed Bridge Fixed bridge design offers thru-body stringing for stronger tone and sustain.WILL SHIP TO LOWER 48 STATES ONLY Normal 0 false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE
Title: Ibanez RGT6EXFX Blue Chameleon Guitar - Ultra Rare- PRICE REDUCED
